review: Pros:You can tell its android (FireOS I'm sure), the developer options are exposed and you can load apk's on it and use adb (though I haven't tried yet but I did see the options in settings)It has a remote, I like the chromcast but having to unlock your phone to pause or play the next episode makes you appreciate the remote.Cons:There doesn't seem to be a way to restrict purchases without also requiring a PIN to adjust settings.This device won't output 1080i preventing use on my older big screen that doesn't support 1080p or 720p. (the chromecast does work at 1080i on this tv)
